messages.message: Tip: I found an easy & dirty way to test UI for external users without using an external account/changing the email. We can set `window.context.viewer_context.email` in the browser console, and the UI should reflect the changes. If you want the change to persist across page reloads, you can look into the Tempermonkey (https://www.tampermonkey.net/index.php?version=5.3.3&ext=dhdg&updated=true#features) Chrome extension. Of course, the backend will still consider the user as an internal user since these scripts won't affect the backend.
